summary:
Ever thought skyrim had no unimmerisive physics. Fall speed had max, Arrows vanished at certain ranges, bodies dont go flying much, Max arrows in an npc etc. This mod changes all of that. Apart of the CryRim Series - a new immerisive mod pack coming out.

Features:
-There is no limit of how many arrows can stay in a npc.
descriptionHtml:
Ever thought skyrim had no unimmerisive physics. Fall speed had max, Arrows vanished at certain ranges, bodies dont go flying much, Max arrows in an npc etc. This mod changes all of that. Apart of the CryRim Series - a new immerisive mod pack coming out.

Features:
-There is no limit of how many arrows can stay in a npc.
-Arrows have a longer lifetime in bodies
-The force limit is greatly changed.
-Arrows have more immersive physics, range is x300 increased before they vanish in flight.
-Arrows can Pin npcs
-Arrows can also go through small holes in cages or doors.
-Ragdoll force is greatly changed to a more realistic: min is decreased so the less force in the kill, less in the body, more force the more damage.
-Effects the strenght of bows now.
-Falling now accelatarates.
-Debris now has a x100 limit increase
-Explosions now have no limit to force, depends on impact etc of how strong.
-FUS RO DAH!!!!!! now slowly loses force over time when projected into the air.
-Knockback can be deadly
-Multiplier on force is more realistic
-Impact force now varies and can affect death physics.

1.5 Beta Additions
-FIxed Flying Bodies from arrows
-Balanced Force
-Arrows depending on the type depends on weight, impact force, gliding, speed, accelration, which can affect the damage.
-Fully drawn bows do more damage then less drawn(Make sure your bow is fully drawn)



Compatibility:
-Does not work realistic ragdoll force mod

To Come:
-Arrows depending on there type depends on how slow and strong the impact force is. and Gravity is.
-Disembling draugrs, falmers, arrows, and much more
-Bodies can explode when too much force is active.
-New and better spell force
-Arrows do bleed damage too
-Impact effects fix in water
-Enchament Physical Effect - Meaning: the effect on enchaments show like fire, but on the blade or bow etc too.
-New plugin for exploding bodies will come out


Steam Version
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=229256110
author: Darealslenderman

files.name: CryRim - Realistic Force and Physics 1_0 Beta
